Title: Relates to exercising the right to record police activities
Summary: Relates to exercising the right to record police activities, establishes a private right of action with a claim of unlawful interference with recording police activities, and requires certain information to be posted on the department's website.
LawCode: Add ยง79-o, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to exercising the right to record police activities
